title: Hispanic Republicans Have Democrats Seeing Red in Texas
sub_head: Mayra Flores won a congressional district that went for Hillary Clinton by more than 20 points.
body:
Harlingen, Texas
The birds were making a tremendous racket. We were trying to shoot a campaign commercial for Mayra Flores outside the cotton gin where her father once worked. The foreman remembered Ms. Flores from when she was a teenager. Sheâ€™d toiled in the same fields, now filled with birds so noisy our camera crew found it impossible to record. A worker retrieved a pistol from his truck and fired it into the air. The birds flew off and we got the shot.
